title.rendered: Macallan Distil Your World: The London Edition

excerpt.rendered:
Macallan Distil Your World: The London Edition, was made in collaboration with the Roca Brothers. The brothers are the owners of El Celler de Can Roca in Spain, which has been twice named Best Restaurant in the World. The Distil Your World Series documentary follows the brothers as they explore different cultures and cuisines and source inspiration for their own worlds of whisky-making and gastronomy. The beautiful packaging reflects the exploration of London and the essence captured within, featuring a map of the city. Which city will be next?

Aroma: Nutmeg, sweet Earl Grey tea, orange caramel, lemon-grass, kaffir lime, soy sauce and polished oak.
Palate: Wood and curry spice, Earl Grey tea, treacle sweetness, aniseed. Slightly salty with a complex umami feel.
Finish: Long, viscous, complex and savoury

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
ABV : 57.5%
